home.description.1: Welcome to the public portal of the Platform for the management of foreign aid from the government of guinea.nue at the PGA
home.description.2: The platform is managed by the Directorate of Foreign Assistance of the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Guinea.
home.titleProjet1: THE BEST PROJECTS OF LAST YEAR

about.title: About Us
about.title.description: We are a team of IT consultants from several fields of study (IT, finance, and administration). Our commitment to a range of products has allowed us to become true experts in the implementation of services and solutions
about.description.card.01: Groupe Wolikhai, Partner of Microsoft, Approved Supplier of Digital Services and Value Added Services (SVA), is a Guinean company, working in the fields of information technology (IT), process reengineering and management in various sectors such as government agencies, private and public financial institutions, as well as large industrial corporations. A major player in the training and supply of IT and technological equipment and professional licenses. It is affiliated with the parent company in CANADA called CLARTIC INC. With over 15 years of experience.
about.description.card.02: Propel the company into the digital age using technological, innovative and profitable solutions. We support institutions and companies in the definition and implementation of their management and monitoring strategy allowing them to have clear visibility on the evolution of their activities, to have access to key information in real time allowing them to make effective and appropriate decisions.
about.description.card.03: To be the trusted partner of our clients for a stronger and lasting professional collaboration.We are a group of business, finance, and technology experts who help leaders transform their organizations.

footer.title: About Us
footer.title.description: We are a team of IT consultants from several fields of study (IT, finance, and administration). Our commitment to a range of products has allowed us to become true experts in the implementation of services and solutions

other.title.description: Nous sommes une équipe de consultants en informatique venant de plusieurs domaines d’études (informatique, finance, et administration). Notre engagement à l’égard d’une gamme de produits nous a permis de devenir de véritables experts dans la mise en œuvre des services et solutions
